pages.text: Once you have acquired arconium essence, it can be infused with a block of gold using a pedestal ritual. The resulting arconium gold block has a special ability. If placed under a leprechaun hat that is linked to a pot of gold, the pot will slowly absorb the gold, leaving behind a block of pure arconium.
The absorbed gold will fill the pot far more efficiently than feeding it gold directly. Once the gold arconium block has been purified, it can then be mined and converted to ingots.
